Description.Translated: 聊天翻译器

Punchline.Original: Adds a new menu when right clicking items that lets you easily add/remove items to a list and then export it to Teamcraft
Punchline.Translated: 右键点击物品时新增菜单，可便捷地将物品添加到列表或移除，并导出至Teamcraft

Description.Original:
No more alt tabbing, no more writing down names of items, just add and export!

This plugin is not created by Teamcraft staff and they are not responsible for it. To report issues or request new features, please click the globe icon and submit them using the issues tab.

(Logo used with permission from Teamcraft owner)
Description.Translated:
不需要频繁切换窗口，也不必手动记录物品名称，直接添加并导出即可！  

此插件并非Teamcraft团队开发，他们不对本插件负责。如需反馈问题或申请新功能，请点击地球图标并通过问题选项卡提交。  

（Logo已获得Teamcraft所有者许可使用）

Punchline.Original: Chat Commands for Teleporting
Punchline.Translated: 传送用聊天指令

Description.Original:
Adds Chat Commands to Teleport to Aetherytes or Areas by Name.
e.g. /tp Quarrymill or /tpm South Shroud
Supports setting up an Alias for Aetherytes to be used with Teleporter Commands
e.g. /tp home instead of /tp Estate Hall (Free Company)
Description.Translated:
添加通过名称传送至以太水晶或区域的聊天指令。  
例如：/tp 石场水车 或 /tpm 南森  
支持为以太水晶设置别名，用于传送指令  
例如：/tp 家 替代 /tp 部队大厅

Punchline.Original: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.
Punchline.Translated: 允许将所有文本框替换为你选择的背景。

Description.Original: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.
Description.Translated: 允许将所有文本框替换为你选择的背景。

Punchline.Original: Chat and game dialogue TTS plugin.
Punchline.Translated: 聊天与游戏对话文本转语音插件。

Description.Original: Chat and game dialogue TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.
Description.Translated: 聊天和游戏对话文本转语音。使用/tttconfig命令配置启用的频道与触发条件/例外规则。

Punchline.Original: Configure sounds for critical and direct hits, plus some countdown music.
Punchline.Translated: 配置暴击和直击的音效，以及倒计时音乐。

Description.Original: Deal critical hits just like in the #1 hat simulator, Team Fortress 2.
Description.Translated: 像头号帽子模拟器《军团要塞2》那样打出暴击。

Punchline.Original:
[REQUIRES TF2 INSTALLED FOR MOST FEATURES] The Mann Brothers just found a deposit of gravel in Eorzea
and hired YOU, Mercenary of Light, to help them FIGHT for it.
Punchline.Translated:
[需要安装TF2才能使用大部分功能] Mann兄弟在艾欧泽亚发现了一处砾石矿藏
并雇佣了你——光之佣兵——来帮他们争夺开采权。

Description.Original:
* Show a Win Panel (with sounds!) when you clear or get wiped in a duty.
* Show a TF2-style timer while in a duty.
* Enable the "Voice Lines" module (via /tfconfig) to have voice lines play when certain conditions are met. What conditions, you ask? It's a surprise! (Unless you uncheck the "Surprise me!" box.)
* More features maybe soon?

Note: This plugin uses files from a local Team Fortress 2 installation.
It'll search for the game's installation folder in all configured Steam Library Folders automatically.

Without a TF2 install, the Timer and Win Panel will work with FF XIV fonts, and no voice line will work.
Description.Translated:
* 在副本通关或团灭时显示胜利面板（带音效！）
* 在副本内显示TF2风格的计时器
* 启用"语音台词"模块（通过/tfconfig命令）可在满足特定条件时播放语音台词。什么条件？这是个惊喜！（除非你取消勾选"给我惊喜！"选项）
* 更多功能可能即将推出？

注：本插件需使用本地安装的《军团要塞2》游戏文件
它会自动在所有配置的Steam游戏库文件夹中搜索游戏安装目录

若未安装TF2，计时器和胜利面板将使用FF14默认字体运行，且所有语音台词功能均不可用

Punchline.Original: A dot to mark players hitbox.
Punchline.Translated: 标记玩家受击判定范围的圆点。

Description.Original: A dot to mark players hitbox
Description.Translated: 用于标记玩家命中判定点的圆点

Punchline.Original: Add separators to various numbers.
Punchline.Translated: 为各类数字添加分隔符。

Description.Original:
Add separators to various numbers.

- Damage/healing numbers (not DoTs or other players' numbers)
- Party list HP
- Ability costs on hotbars
- Ability costs in tooltips
Description.Translated:
为各类数字添加分隔符。

- 伤害/治疗数值（不包括持续伤害或其他玩家的数值）
- 小队列表生命值
- 热键栏上的技能消耗
- 工具提示中的技能消耗

Punchline.Original: Set your character's title - now with Searchalin!
Punchline.Translated: 设置你的角色称号 - 现已支持Searchalin搜索功能！

Description.Original:
The Heart of the Party is a remake of the in-game title picker, but it
supports searching. Note that it doesn't add a command to set your title; use
the built-in /title command instead.
Description.Translated: 《团队核心》是对游戏内称号选择器的重构版本，但新增了搜索功能。请注意它并未添加设置称号的命令，请使用内置的/title命令。

Punchline.Original: Tracks the current tick for HP/MP/GP regen
Punchline.Translated: 追踪当前HP/MP/GP恢复的周期计时

Description.Original: Customizable bars that indicate the tick progress of HP/MP/GP regen
Description.Translated: 可自定义的进度条，显示HP/MP/GP恢复的周期进度

Punchline.Original: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.
Punchline.Translated: 更好的游戏消息系统和深入聊天过滤器，保持聊天窗口整洁。

Description.Original:
It is highly recommended to edit the default settings as you may disagree on which messages should be considered "spam"!

            Provides granular filter options to filter nearly all game-related spam, leaving only important game messages in your chat.

            - Filters most spammy game messages
            - Blocks emote spam from other players
            - Condenses earned commendations into a single line
            - Shortens lengthy messages such as joining Novice Network or entering an instanced zone
            - Blocks repeated messages from appearing for a period of time
            - Automatically copies most 'with your chat mode in /say' quest dialogue to your clipboard
            - And more!
Description.Translated:
强烈建议您根据个人需求编辑默认设置，因为每个人对何种消息应视为“垃圾信息”的看法可能不同！

            提供精细的筛选选项，可过滤掉几乎所有游戏相关的垃圾信息，仅保留重要的游戏消息在您的聊天窗口中。

            - 过滤大多数垃圾游戏消息
            - 屏蔽来自其他玩家的情感动作刷屏
            - 将获得的最优队员信息压缩为单行显示
            - 缩短冗长的消息，例如加入新人频道或进入副本区域
            - 在一段时间内阻止重复消息出现
            - 自动将大多数“使用说话聊天模式”的任务对话复制到您的剪贴板
            - 以及更多功能！

Punchline.Original: Tilt the camera, not yourself.
Punchline.Translated: 倾斜镜头，而非角色自身。

Description.Original: Automatic Camera Adjustments
Description.Translated: 自动镜头调整

Punchline.Original: Tippy, your new FFXIV virtual assistant.
Punchline.Translated: Tippy，你的FFXIV虚拟助手。

Description.Original:
Developed by goat for April Fools 2021 and unnecessarily resurrected by kal and adopted by Critical-Impact.

Handcrafted by our finest code artisans with special AI, 
he will analyze your playstyle to give you useful tips to get your GAMING to the next level.

Some things he can do:
* He can give general tips about the game
* He can give tips about the job you're playing
* He can report on your battle performance
* He will respect your feelings
Description.Translated:
由goat为2021年愚人节开发，后被kal不必要地复活并由Critical-Impact接手。

由我们最优秀的代码工匠精心打造，搭载特殊AI，
他将分析您的游戏风格，提供实用建议助您将游戏水平提升至新高度。

他能做到：
* 提供游戏通用建议
* 针对您当前职业给出提示
* 汇报您的战斗表现
* 会照顾您的感受

Punchline.Original: Create, share, and shuffle custom title and character select screens for FFXIV.
Punchline.Translated: 创建、分享并随机切换《最终幻想14》的自定义标题界面与角色选择画面。

Description.Original:
Create your own custom title or character select screen of your favorite location in-game, and open the game right up to that spot every time.
Includes a number of preinstalled title and character select screen presets for you to use or get inspiration from, and an easy to use importer to use presets that others have shared!
Character select presets support recording your last visited location, per character display setting and even displaying yourself on a mount.
Description.Translated:
创建属于你的自定义标题画面或角色选择界面，每次都能直接进入你最爱的游戏场景。  
包含多款预装的标题画面与角色选择界面预设，供你直接使用或获取灵感，还有便捷的导入功能可使用他人分享的预设！  
角色选择预设支持记录你最后访问的位置、为每个角色单独设置显示选项，甚至能让你骑乘坐骑亮相。

Punchline.Original: Pick titles you want in a title roulette.
Punchline.Translated: 选择你想加入随机称号的称号。

Description.Original: Allows you to pick any number of titles, setting a random one each time you use "/ptitle" or "/ptitle groupName".
Description.Translated: 允许你选择任意数量的称号，每次使用"/ptitle"或"/ptitle 组名"时随机设置一个。

Punchline.Original: Keep on top of new items.
Punchline.Translated: 随时掌握新物品动态。

Description.Original: Displays new items, crystals, and gil as toasts.
Description.Translated: 以通知形式显示新获得的物品、水晶和金币。

Punchline.Original: A Plugin that lets you add notes to item Tooltips
Punchline.Translated: 一个可在物品提示信息中添加备注的插件

Description.Original: Right-click any item in your inventory to start adding a note,or make a label in the config window to start adding your own labels
Description.Translated: 右键点击背包中的任意物品开始添加备注，或在配置窗口中创建标签来添加自定义标签

Punchline.Original: Sums up all "skill" levels like that one classic MMORPG
Punchline.Translated: 将所有“技能”等级相加，就像那个经典 MMORPG 一样。

Description.Original: Shows the total level of a Character in the Search Info panel
Description.Translated: 在搜索信息面板中显示角色的总等级。

Punchline.Original: Finish your sightseeing log.
Punchline.Translated: 完成你的风脉泉日志。

Description.Original:
Tourist adds a window to assist with the sightseeing log.

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

"sightseeing" icon by muhammad, from thenounproject.com CC BY 3.0
Description.Translated:
Tourist插件新增了一个窗口来协助完成风脉泉日志。

- 显示当前可触发的风脉泉观测点
- 为2.0版本风脉泉添加标记
- 在地图上直接查看观测点位置
- 隐藏已完成的或当前无法触发的观测点
- 显示每个观测点所需的触发指令

"风脉泉"图标由muhammad设计(源自thenounproject.com，CC BY 3.0协议)

Punchline.Original: Tracking data is fun
Punchline.Translated: 追踪数据很有趣

Description.Original: Tracking data is fun
Description.Translated: 追踪数据很有趣

Punchline.Original: Choo Choo
Punchline.Translated: 嘟嘟

Description.Original:
Import your data from Turtle, then manage everything in the GUI!

There is a known bug with the dragging of List of monsters. Dragging works, but there is a graphical glitch while dragging. It is completely cosmetic but annoying. The arrows work without issue. I will work on fixing this.
Description.Translated:
从Turtle导入数据，然后在图形界面中管理一切！

已知怪物列表拖拽功能存在一个bug。拖拽功能正常，但拖拽时会出现图形显示问题。这完全只是视觉效果问题但很烦人。箭头功能工作正常。我会尽快修复这个问题。

Punchline.Original: Triple triad solver
Punchline.Translated: 三重斗灵卡牌求解器

Description.Original: Triple triad solver
Description.Translated: 三重斗灵卡牌求解器

Punchline.Original: Sup y'all? It's ya boy, Twitch XIV, and today we're gonna be playing some final fantasy fourteen.
Punchline.Translated: 各位好啊！我是你们的老伙计Twitch XIV，今天我们要来玩最终幻想14（FF14）。

Description.Original: Allows you to join a Twitch chat and send messages and (optionally) have the twitch chat come through your chatbox.
Description.Translated: 允许你加入Twitch聊天室并发送消息，（可选）让Twitch聊天内容显示在你的游戏聊天框中。

Punchline.Original: Adds fully customizable toolbars and 3D world markers to the game.
Punchline.Translated: 为游戏添加完全可自定义的工具栏和3D世界标记。

Description.Original: Umbra UI
Description.Translated: Umbra UI

Punchline.Original: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname
Punchline.Translated: 记录玩家曾用名和昵称的简易工具

Description.Original: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname base on SocialList. Right click on the target to add/sub/check the used names and nickname.
Description.Translated: 基于社交列表记录玩家曾用名与昵称的简易工具。右键点击目标可添加/删除/查看曾用名与昵称。

Punchline.Original: VFX editor and viewer
Punchline.Translated: 特效编辑与查看器

Description.Original: VFX, animation, and sound editing plugin. Icon by PAPACHIN
Description.Translated: 视觉特效、动画与音效编辑插件。图标由PAPACHIN制作

Punchline.Original: Save and load actions into hotbars without taking up extra job hotbars.
Punchline.Translated: 将技能保存并加载到热键栏中，无需占用额外的职业热键栏。

Description.Original: Save and load actions into hotbars without taking up extra job hotbars.
Description.Translated: 将技能保存并加载到热键栏中，无需占用额外的职业热键栏。

Punchline.Original: A collection of various game modifications
Punchline.Translated: 一系列游戏功能修改合集

Description.Original: This plugin is primarily focused on various UI adjustments, behavior adjustments, and adding new native elements to the game
Description.Translated: 本插件主要专注于对游戏内各类 UI 进行调整、优化游戏行为，并添加新的原生界面元素。

Punchline.Original: Bookmark the venues you visit. View and manage guests for venues.
Punchline.Translated: 为你造访的场所添加书签。查看并管理场所的宾客名单。

Description.Original: Save and share venues you visit or own. Get updates and logs for visitors coming and going. Guest list management tools for venue owners to view and easily export it for use with other applications. Icon by Silv :)
Description.Translated: 保存并分享你参观或拥有的场馆。获取访客到访与离场的最新动态与日志。为场馆所有者提供访客名单管理工具，可查看并轻松导出数据以便在其他应用中使用。图标由Silv提供 :)

Punchline.Original: Tag items as important, highlighting them visually. Now with sound!
Punchline.Translated: 将物品标记为重要，使其高亮显示。现在包含音效！

Description.Original: Adding and removing items to and from the list of very important items can be done in the plugin's configuration window and by right-clicking items in the game. Very important items get their name highlighted in the tooltip, and a sound effect plays in addition to that to ensure you've seen its presence.
Description.Translated: 在插件配置窗口或游戏中右键点击物品即可添加/移除高优先级物品列表。高优先级物品的提示信息中名称会高亮显示，并伴随音效提醒确保你注意到它。

Punchline.Original: Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Punchline.Translated: 允许你隐藏玩家、宠物、陆行鸟和仆从。

Description.Original:
Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp
Description.Translated:
允许你隐藏玩家、宠物、陆行鸟和宠物。
包含VoidList功能，这是一个更完善的黑名单。
可通过/pvis命令访问
更多信息可通过/xlhelp查看

Punchline.Original: Changes your VO language on a per-duty basis
Punchline.Translated: 根据任务自动切换语音语言

Description.Original: Changes your VO language by specifying a language and an instance, your language will revert to the default when you exit. Icon designed by Leremy from Flaticon
Description.Translated: 通过指定语言和实例来更改语音语言，退出时将恢复为默认语言。图标由Flaticon的Leremy设计

Punchline.Original: View encounter strategy images.
Punchline.Translated: 查看副本攻略图片。

Description.Original: A plugin to display encounter strategies, or cats.
Description.Translated: 一个显示副本攻略，或猫猫的插件。

Punchline.Original: View a list of all the Wondrous Tails duties shared by your party.
Punchline.Translated: 查看队伍成员共享的所有天书奇谈副本列表。

Description.Original: WTSync keeps uses an external server to keep track of the duties in your Wondrous Tails book. When you're in a party, and other players in the party are also using WTSync, you can open a UI to see which duties everyone needs at once in one convenient list.
Description.Translated: WTSync通过外部服务器同步记录您的《异闻神典石》副本进度。当您组队时，若队友也使用WTSync，可打开界面一键查看全队成员所需副本的便捷列表。

Punchline.Original: Set out for Dawntrail and make your queues a breeze. Waitingway provides crowdsourced FFXIV login queue times, now with Discord queue notification features.
Punchline.Translated: 启程前往晓月之终途，让排队更轻松。Waitingway提供FF14登录队列时间的众包数据，现已支持Discord队列通知功能。

Description.Original:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login, duty, and roulette queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue time estimates and notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it into the game, as well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your queue times to crowdsource information about FFXIV server load and activity. Join our Discord for more information!

Discord URL: https://waiting.camora.dev/discord
Description.Translated:
贡献并利用众筹的登录、任务和随机任务队列信息，造福所有玩家。

当前功能包括队列时间预估和通过Discord发送通知，让你能及时知晓何时进入游戏，同时匿名收集并上报你的队列时间统计数据，众筹关于FF14服务器负载和活跃度的信息。加入我们的Discord获取更多详情！

Discord链接：https://waiting.camora.dev/discord

Punchline.Original: Never mess up your wave emoticon again!
Punchline.Translated: 再也不会搞错你的波浪表情了！

Description.Original: Never mess up your wave emoticon again!
Description.Translated: 再也不会搞错你的波浪表情了！

Punchline.Original: Improved Waymark Management
Punchline.Translated: 改进版标记点管理

Description.Original: Allows you to save, edit, place, import, export, and preview an unlimited number of waymark presets.
Description.Translated: 允许你保存、编辑、放置、导入、导出及预览无限数量的路标预设。

Punchline.Original: Allows precise control over time and weather per zone or globally.
Punchline.Translated: 允许精确控制每个区域或全局的时间和天气。

Description.Translated:
功能：
- 随心更改游戏内时间和天气；
- 可全局应用或针对每个区域单独设置；
- 彻底阻止不想要的天气出现。

本插件仅改变视觉效果：与时间/天气相关的功能（如区域背景音乐、风脉泉可用性、特定物体状态）将不受影响。
仅对有开放天空的区域生效（目前尚未支持全部此类区域，持续开发中）。

Punchline.Original: Persistent NPC Flavor Text
Punchline.Translated: 持续显示NPC对话文本

Description.Original: Prints NPC speech bubbles to the chat log.  Please check the plugin settings and your chat log filters to make sure that they are compatible with each other.
Description.Translated: 将NPC对话气泡打印到聊天日志中。请检查插件设置和聊天日志过滤器以确保它们彼此兼容。

Punchline.Original: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in next to the server info.
Punchline.Translated: 在服务器信息旁显示你所在的区域/地区/领地信息。

Description.Original: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in next to the server info.
Description.Translated: 在服务器信息旁显示你所在的区域/地区/领地信息。

Punchline.Original: Allows you to not lose track of your mouse on the screen
Punchline.Translated: 让你不会在屏幕上丢失鼠标指针的踪迹

Description.Original: Never lose track of your mouse again
Description.Translated: 再也不必担心找不到鼠标了

Punchline.Original: Making it easier to know where you are.
Punchline.Translated: 让你更容易知道自己在哪里。

Description.Original: Movable text overlay of the current location name. Please consider migrationg to WhereAmIAgain, which is actively maintained and has more features.
Description.Translated: 当前位置名称的可移动文字覆盖层。建议迁移至仍在积极维护且功能更多的WhereAmIAgain插件。

Punchline.Original: Check what mount someone is using and browse the full mount collection.
Punchline.Translated: 查看某人当前使用的坐骑并浏览完整坐骑收藏。

Description.Original: Searching for other player's mount
Description.Translated: 正在探查其他玩家的坐骑。

Punchline.Original: Quickly check the patch an item was released in!
Punchline.Translated: 快速查询物品发布的版本补丁！

Description.Original:
Whenever you mouseover an item, the tooltip will show you the patch the item was released in.
Never carry around old useless crafting materials again!
Description.Translated:
当鼠标悬停在物品上时，提示框会显示该物品发布的版本号。
再也不用随身携带没用的老旧制作材料了！

Punchline.Original: Ever forget who you are? We can fix that!
Punchline.Translated: 忘记自己是谁了？我们能解决这个问题！

Description.Original: Shows who you are in the server info bar.
Description.Translated: 在服务器信息栏显示你的身份。

Punchline.Original: Actively logs healing, cleanses, buffs, and more. Finally figure out who rescued you.
Punchline.Translated: 主动记录治疗、净化、增益等行为。终于能知道是谁对你使用了营救。

Description.Original: Who Did That?
Description.Translated: 谁 TM 干的？

Punchline.Original: Chat history plugin, view history per character, per group, or search.
Punchline.Translated: 聊天记录插件，可按角色、分组查看历史记录或搜索。

Description.Original:
Chat history plugin, view history per character, per group, or search.
 Main command /whowhat
Description.Translated:
聊天记录插件，可按角色、分组查看历史记录或进行搜索。
主命令 /whowhat

Punchline.Original: Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft.
Punchline.Translated: 以时尚方式显示附近玩家，灵感源自《魔兽世界》的"/who"指令。

Description.Original:
Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft

Features:
- Minimalistic interface that can be scaled down to become part of your HUD.
- Player context menu items for examining, searching on the Lodestone and more.
- Customizable colours & behaviour.
- Random adventure plate command
- Display nearby player count in the server info bar

Please note this plugin will automatically disable functionality in PvP.
Description.Translated:
以《魔兽世界》"/who"指令为灵感，用时尚方式显示附近玩家

功能：
- 极简界面可缩放至最小尺寸，成为HUD的一部分
- 玩家右键菜单包含查看资料、在Lodestone搜索等功能
- 可自定义颜色与行为
- 随机冒险者铭牌指令
- 在服务器信息栏显示附近玩家人数

注意：本插件在PvP场景中会自动禁用功能

Punchline.Original: See Discord voice activity indicators directly on your party list.
Punchline.Translated: 在队伍列表上直接显示Discord语音活动状态。

Description.Original: See Discord voice activity indicators directly on your party list.
Description.Translated: 在队伍列表上直接显示Discord语音活动状态。

Punchline.Original: FFXIV Wiki and Eorzea DB context menu integration
Punchline.Translated: FFXIV维基和艾欧泽亚数据库右键菜单整合

Description.Original: Never forget how to get an item again! Just right-click, and *gobbie-BOOM!* Integrates with any community wiki as well as the official Eorzea DB.
Description.Translated: 再也不用担心忘记如何获取物品了！只需右键点击，然后*哥布嘣！* 可整合任意社区维基及艾欧泽亚官方数据库。

Punchline.Original: Change your game window titie
Punchline.Translated: 更改游戏窗口标题

Description.Original: Allows you to change your game window title
Description.Translated: 允许修改游戏窗口标题

Punchline.Original: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.
Punchline.Translated: 为天书奇谈界面添加行概率显示。

Description.Original: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.
Description.Translated: 该插件会在游戏内显示《天书奇谈》中达成一行的概率，以及洗牌后的平均达成概率。

Punchline.Original: A roleplay thesaurus and scratch pad.
Punchline.Translated: 一个角色扮演同义词词典与草稿板。

Description.Original: Wordsmith is a text editor with roleplayers in mind. It automatically breaks your text up for easy copy/paste, has advanced features, spellcheck, and even a thesaurus.
Description.Translated: Wordsmith是一款专为角色扮演玩家设计的文本编辑器。它能自动分段以便复制粘贴，拥有高级功能、拼写检查甚至同义词词典。

Punchline.Original: Optimize Island Sanctuary Workshop orders.
Punchline.Translated: 优化无人岛工坊订单。

Description.Original: Use /wso after you visited your island.
Description.Translated: 访问无人岛后使用/wso命令。

Punchline.Original: Use chat away from the game.
Punchline.Translated: 在游戏外使用聊天功能。

Description.Original:
XIVChat is a suite of software allowing you to use FFXIV's chat from
different devices. This is the server component required to do so.

For information about clients to use with this server, see the website.
Description.Translated:
XIVChat是一套软件工具，可让你在不同设备上使用FF14的聊天功能。这是运行所需的服务器组件。

有关配套客户端的信息，请参阅官网。

Punchline.Original: PvP, but in PvE!
Punchline.Translated: PVP，不过是PVE版！

Description.Original: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu
Description.Translated: 该插件可将连击技能与互斥技能整合到单个按钮上。/pcombo 打开菜单

Punchline.Original: Toggle controller / mouse mode automatically or with commands.
Punchline.Translated: 自动或通过指令切换控制器/鼠标模式。

Description.Original: The Great Controller HUD Switcher
Description.Translated: 伟大的控制器 HUD 切换器

Punchline.Original: Turn your Elgato Stream Deck into a hotbar!
Punchline.Translated: 将你的Elgato Stream Deck变成热键栏！

Description.Original:
This plugin allows players to use an Elgato Stream Deck as a virtual utility hot bar. Actions are called directly, meaning there is no need to set up awkward keybinds, custom macros, or any other settings.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe#2896 in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
Description.Translated:
该插件允许玩家使用Elgato Stream Deck作为虚拟功能热键栏。技能可直接调用，无需设置繁琐的按键绑定、自定义宏或其他设置。

请注意，必须同时安装XIVDeck Stream Deck插件才能正常使用。您可以在GitHub仓库的"Releases"部分下载Stream Deck插件。

遇到任何问题请向Dalamud支持服务器的KazWolfe#2896报告，或在GitHub上提交Issue。

Punchline.Original: Highlight duplicated items in inventories /xivdupes.
Punchline.Translated: 高亮显示背包中的重复物品 /xivdupes

Description.Original: Highlight stackable items in the inventory that are not stacked.
Description.Translated: 高亮显示背包中未堆叠的可堆叠物品。

Punchline.Original: Fixes SquareEnix' botched antialiasing implementation
Punchline.Translated: 修复SquareEnix糟糕的抗锯齿实现

Description.Original:
With the release of 7.0 SquareEnix has implemented several temporal antialiasing solutions. However they all have a severe bug that affects image quality significantly.
This plugin will restore using jitter when talking to NPCs or in cutscenes and gpose. Jitter (not noticeable micromovements of the camera) is necessary for temporal antialiasing solutions (DLSS, DLAA, TSCMAA+jitter) to work properly.
For some reason, SquareEnix decided we don't need jitter during the time where the game benefits from using it the most.
Description.Translated:
随着7.0版本的发布，SquareEnix实装了多种时间性抗锯齿方案。但它们都存在严重影响画质的严重缺陷。
本插件将在与NPC对话、过场动画和拍照模式时恢复使用抖动效果。抖动（肉眼不可察觉的镜头微动）是DLSS、DLAA、TSCMAA+抖动等时间性抗锯齿方案正常工作的必要条件。
出于某些原因，SquareEnix认为游戏最需要抗锯齿效果的场景反而应该禁用抖动。

Punchline.Original: Save chat logs to your computer as text files or copy them!
Punchline.Translated: 将聊天记录保存为文本文件或复制到剪贴板！

Description.Original: Save chat logs as text files from when this is loaded. /xivlogger for settings, /savelog to save logs, /copylogs to copy logs.
Description.Translated: 保存聊天记录为文本文件（加载本插件后生效）。使用/xivlogger设置，/savelog保存日志，/copylogs复制日志。

Punchline.Original: Splits combos into more button for more button bloating. Requires BLU spells.
Punchline.Translated: 将连击拆分为更多按键以实现按键膨胀。需要青魔法师技能。

Description.Original: This plugin splits combos and native abilities into more buttons.
Description.Translated: 本插件会将连击和职业技能拆分为多个按钮。

Punchline.Original: Game window resizing plugin. Ever wanted to take 8K screenshots on 144p screen? Now you can.
Punchline.Translated: 游戏窗口缩放插件。想在144p屏幕上拍8K截图吗？现在可以实现了。

Description.Original: Game window resizing plugin mostly intended for users who want to take screenshots at resolutions higher than their display resolution without going fullscreen and using DSR and similar features.
Description.Translated: 主要为窗口缩放插件的游戏窗口大小调整。

Punchline.Original: Takes a screenshot upon death (and other events).
Punchline.Translated: 在死亡（及其他事件）时自动截图。

Description.Original: Takes screenshots automatically for events.
Description.Translated: 在某些事件发生时自动截图。

Punchline.Original: A simple utility that allows easy export of your gearsets to xivgear.app.
Punchline.Translated: 一个简易工具，可轻松将你的装备方案导出至xivgear.app。

Description.Original: A plugin that allows easy export of gearsets to xivgear.app.
Description.Translated: 一款便于将装备套装导出至 xivgear.app 的插件。

Punchline.Original: ZeeDees, bring the Zs to your Ds!
Punchline.Translated: ZeeDees，给你的D带来Z的力量！

Description.Original: Show when cooldowns come off cooldown in an intuitive way!
Description.Translated: 显示技能冷却结束时间的直观方式！

Punchline.Original: Complete your Zodiac relic with style.
Punchline.Translated: 用时尚风格完成你的黄道武器。

Description.Original: Complete your Zodiac relic with style.
Description.Translated: 用时尚风格完成你的黄道武器。

Punchline.Original: Crowdsourced housing alerts and lottery tracking for all.
Punchline.Translated: 全民共享的房屋购买提醒与抽签追踪系统。

Description.Original:
Looking for that perfect house? PaissaHouse lets you receive notifications when a new plot of land is up for sale on your home world.
View the list of all houses available on a world at https://paissadb.zhu.codes/!

Want to contribute? Check out the repository (globe icon below) for instructions.
Description.Translated:
在寻找理想住宅吗？PaissaHouse能在你的服务器有新土地出售时发送通知。
查看全服务器可用房屋列表请访问：https://paissadb.zhu.codes/！

Punchline.Translated: 使无边框窗口模式与Aero快捷键完美兼容

Description.Original: Proper borderless window mode.
Description.Translated: 无边框窗口模式。

Punchline.Original: Customizable, Source Engine-styled position info
Punchline.Translated: 可自定义的、Source引擎风格的位置信息

Description.Original: Shows your exact position, rotation, and velocity on screen. Based off of the cl_showpos command from the Source Engine.
Description.Translated: 在屏幕上显示你的精确位置、朝向和移动速度。基于Source引擎的cl_showpos命令。

Punchline.Original: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.
Punchline.Translated: 添加一个简单的界面用于浏览和更改游戏内背景音乐。

Description.Original:
Orchestrion Plugin allows you to change the currently playing in-game BGM. It includes
a curated list of the most accurate in-game song titles, so you know exactly what's playing,
if you want to know later! Add favorite songs to separate them from the rest.
Note: This plugin does not currently allow you to play actual orchestrion songs.
Description.Translated:
管弦乐插件允许你更改当前播放的游戏背景音乐。它包含经过精心整理的精确游戏曲目列表，让你能准确知道正在播放的音乐，方便日后查询！可将喜爱的歌曲单独收藏标记。

注意：该插件目前不支持播放实际的管弦乐琴乐谱音乐。

Punchline.Original: owo for your chat
Punchline.Translated: owo 聊天用语

Description.Original: This plugin uwu's your chat.
Description.Translated: 这个插件会将你的聊天内容萌化。
